Text: Plan on uploading "For Richer or Poorer (1997)" next (Tim Allen movie)

i like the fact that you tell us in advance what is coming next.  gives me a good heads up and lets me plan my seeding ration and when i should get my older dvd-r's off my HDD even though i have a 500GB.  you are doing awesome man.  im sure there are plenty of people to agree with me too.
thanks zombifuzz...always good to hear good things

Hey bro great upload again. I was wondering if I could tag you in my uploads. I think we have awesome upload qualities and it'd be cool to be affiliated with someone who also does amazing work. Let me know what you think. If no no big deal man no hard feelings.
